goals.goal1F: Connect 3 Stations to the edges of the map.
goals.goal1G: Build a track along 4 different Mountain ranges.
goals.goal1J: Complete 1 Building with tracks from more than 1 Station.
goals.goal1L: Connect 3 Towns to the same Station.
goals.goal2B: Complete 2 Jails (this does not mean fill them with Bandits).
goals.goal2D: Build tracks extending from 4 different Stations, connecting to Mountain ranges.
goals.goal2F: Connect to 3 Towns by the River.

company.companyC1: This round, Banks are completed with 2 tracks instead of 3 (Desert maps only).
company.companyC2: This round, when you draw track(s) around a Fort, draw an additional track.
company.companyC3: This round, Saloons are completed with 1 track instead of 2.
company.companyC4: This round, Poker hands score double (If you already have this bonus through an active Saloon, your Poker hand scores triple).
company.companyC5: This round, you may sacrifice 1 of your 3 tracks to extend from any Station.
company.companyC6: This round, you may draw 2 tracks instead of 3. If you do, 1 of the 2 tracks can be a Switch.
company.companyC7: This round, you may draw 2 tracks instead of 3. If you do, 1 of the 2 tracks can be a Bridge.
company.companyC8: This round, you may draw 2 tracks instead of 3. If you do, 1 of the 2 tracks can be a Tunnel.
company.companyC9: This round, you may draw 2 tracks instead of 3. If you do, 1 of the 2 tracks can be a Shortcut.
company.companyC10: This round, any Goals you complete score an additional 5 points.
